APPRENTICE.TITLE: Thales (period of) apprenticeship
APPRENTICE.BODY: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Sunt ut voluptatum eius sapiente, totam reiciendis temporibus qui quibusdam.

DESC.0: New contactless ticketing solution for the transport operators, Transcity Pass. is a modular solution that adapts to all network sizes and passenger flows.

DESC.1: The offer TransCity Pass allows different tariff rules put in place by the operator: billing in a single trip, depending on distance traveled or as defined areas (urban, inter-urban, regional ...).

DESC.2: The tickets can be anonymous or customized, in paper (board sales) or without contact (tickets for single journeys, passes or multiple trips cards).

MISSION.TITLE: Front end developper
MISSION.DESCRIPTION:
Within a team of 7-10 people, I participate in the development of
  • Front-Office. It allows users to access the monitoring of their subscriptions, to reload the electronic purse etc ...
  • Back-Office. Connected to all the equipment of the system ensuring the sale and validation of tickets, it performs setup functions, supervision, reporting, media monitoring, customer management, financial distribution operators.

DESC.0: Thales provides the entire solution, from the expertise required to launch the new card to the ticketing equipment, security and operating systems

MISSION.TITLE: Fireman
MISSION.DESCRIPTION:
Within a team of 8-10 people, I did a lot of fix over interfaces of the
  • Front-Office It allows users to access the monitoring of their subscriptions, to reload the electronic purse etc ...
  • Back-Office Connected to all the equipment of the system ensuring the sale and validation of tickets, it performs setup functions, supervision, reporting, media monitoring, customer management, financial distribution operators.
  • Call center It allows tellers to help customers carry out transactions on their accounts or their transport cards.

DESC.0: The AT Hop Card was created to try to remedy the diversity of bus companies offering travelers a unique transportation card, it concerns only the following companies: Metrolink, LINK, North Star, GO WEST and Waka Pacific.

DESC.0: Ticketing solution operated by OTLIS transport operator.

DESC.1: The data systems (pricing, system topology, translations for equipment, etc.) are stored in a file in XML format. To simplify data entry, Thales has developed its own XML editor whose construction data is based on the XSD scheme.

MISSION.TITLE: Trainee Software Engineer
MISSION.DESCRIPTION:
In partnership with my technical mentor, I have enriched the XML editor with new features:
  • visualisation(Datepicker, sliders, ...)
  • data validation, complement the XSD validation scheme(start date less than an end date, ...)
